name: Galaxy Aggression 2
description:
Visit the abandoned planet Thebes as you fight hordes of enemies and protect what's left of the dying planet.

Experience new and improved graphics and a new powerup that actually destroys incoming asteroids unlike the prequel where it was impossible.

Galaxy Aggression 2 contains endless gameplay that will keep the player hooked and playing for hours. If you have trouble running the game, please don't hesitate to contact support for help
